column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suyin says : " You know , before I built this city , there was nothing here .
#Text=Thank you for being so welcoming .
#Text=And I 'm sorry for how Lin 's been acting .
#Text=Can I ask what happened with you two ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " It 's complicated .
#Text=We did n't have a normal childhood .
#Text=Neither of us knew our fathers and Toph was always busy being Chief of Police .
#Text=Because mom grew up in such a strict household , she gave us all the freedom in the world , hoping we 'd figure out our own paths .
#Text=" Korra says : " That sounds like a good thing .
#Text=" Suyin says : " And in a way it was .
#Text=But we both ended up fighting for mom 's attention .
#Text=Lin followed in her footsteps and became a cop .
#Text=I was ... more of a rebel .
#Text=Mom was n't too happy with how either of us turned out .
#Text=When I was sixteen , I left home to explore the world .
#Text=I sailed the seas on a pirate ship , joined a traveling circus for a while , and lived in a sandbender commune in a desert .
#Text=It took me a while , but , I finally realized what I was looking for was a family .
#Text=So I bought this plot of land , found a brilliant architect who later became my husband , and created a place I could truly call home .
#Text=" Korra says : " It sounds like you 've created the perfect life here .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Almost .
#Text=I 've always wanted Lin to be a part of it , but I gave up hope long ago of her ever coming around .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , lady .
#Text=Wow , you really blowin ' me away with your airbending .
#Text=Ahhh , woo - woosh , psst .
#Text=" Opal says : " Why are you acting weird ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Why are you acting weird ?
#Text=" Opal says : " I do n't like how you 're talking to me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Look , I 'm sorry .
#Text=I just get really self - conscious when I know when a girl likes me , and I - I end up looking stupid .
#Text=" Opal says : " Who said I liked you ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh no .
#Text=But I though ... Mako said - " Opal says : " Just kidding .
#Text=But , do me a favor and stop trying .
#Text=Look , do n't stop trying .
#Text=Just stop trying so much .
#Text=Just be yourself .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Huh .
#Text=Be myself .
#Text=Yeah , I guess I can give that a shot .
#Text=" Opal says : " Oh , hey Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " Can I steal you away from Bolin for a minute ?
#Text=I need you help with something .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " " Let go your earthly tether .
#Text=I could n't sleep .
#Text=" Ikki says : " What were you reading ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " A poem by Guru Laghima , the wisest airbender who ever lived .
#Text=" Kya says : " Ikki , you should be in bed .
#Text=C'mon .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Night .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Good night .
#Text=" Kya says : " You seem to know a lot about airbender history for someone who just got airbending .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I 've always admired the culture .
#Text=" Kya says : " And you moved through those gates like a natural .
#Text=Where did you say you were from ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " A small village up north .
#Text=You 've probably never heard of it .
#Text=" Kya says : " Wait .
#Text=Zaheer !
#Text=" Kya says : " I need some help !
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " Hold it right there !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Sorry , I wo n't be joining you at the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=I 'm afraid I have other plans .
#Text=" Lin says : " Who is it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Hey , it 's me .
#Text=I brought someone who wants to talk to you .
#Text=" Lin says : " You want to talk ?
#Text=Then talk .
#Text=" Opal says : " I 'm sorry being here has been so hard for you .
#Text=When you showed up , I was so excited to get to know you .
#Text=I heard so many great things about you from mom and Grandma Toph .
#Text=So , I guess I was kind of sad you did n't want to know me .
#Text=Believe me , I know my family can be a little crazy and overwhelming some times .
#Text=But I would love it so much if you would be a part of it .
#Text=" Lin says : " Get out .
#Text=" Opal says : " Sorry , did I say something wrong ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Get out !
#Text=" Korra says : " What 's your problem ?
#Text=Do n't get mad at Opal .
#Text=I asked her to talk to you because I thought it would help you snap out of whatever funk you 're in .
#Text=But I guess I was wrong .
#Text=" Lin says : " Why do n't you focus on fixing the world , and stop trying to fix my family ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Su 's right .
#Text=You 're never going to change .
#Text=You 're always gon na be a bitter , lonely woman .
#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Kya Lin Beifong Mako Opal Beifong Suyin Beifong Antagonists Zaheer says : " Minor Aiwei Baatar Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Chef Daw Huan Ikki Kuvira Meelo Naga Pabu Pema Poki Varrick Wei and Wing White Lotus sentries Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Republic City is a war zone !
#Text=While Prince Wu led the remaining citizens to safety , Team Avatar battled Kuvira 's giant mech , but no amount of bending could bring it down !
#Text=In a last - ditch effort , Asami and her father outfitted the hummingbird suits with platinum cutters .
#Text=Hiroshi helped Team Avatar infiltrate the mecha giant , but he paid the ultimate price !
#Text=Is victory within reach for our heroes ?
#Text="
